sentences.sContent: His hands gently caressed her body.
sentences.sCn: 他的双手温柔地抚摸着她的身体。

sentences.sContent: Margaret took me to one side, holding my arm in a gentle caress.
sentences.sCn: 玛格丽特把我拉到一旁，轻轻地抚弄着我的手臂。

remMethod.val: car(e)(关心， 喜爱)+ess(表女性)→女性的关爱→爱抚

words.tran: 爱抚的；亲切的；表现爱情的

trans.tranOther: to touch someone gently in a way that shows you love them
a gentle touch or kiss that shows you love someone
